channel.title: Can some1 give me good update ideas for my server?
channel.description: OK , so ive run out of ideas on how to upgrade my server , so now i need your help to upgrade my server , as soon as you tell me a good idea , ill put it in updates , and when some1 logs into my server , they'll see that the update was made by : (your name)

item.title: Can some1 give me good update ideas for my server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

niggafree:

i like the horror fishing 1 sounds good. like king blk dragons come at you and your fishing just sitting in a modifed chair lol and you go thru a lil preview movie thing at the start it will be hard but will be a fucking awsome uh…mini game o yea lol

Not Exactly That Hard To Code Lol, Item On Item, Agressive Npcs, Npc Drops, Making Certain Food Heal, Autospawn…
Item On Object, Objects, Not Hard At All

Read full topic

and i like the pc idea to pc is a fun game to have in mopar.! try finding a source that hasa pc and get all the pc info off it and add to your server and get a real working defernders (like in the right hand !) yw for the info !!

item.title: Can some1 give me good update ideas for my server?
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

[quote=“niggafree, post:4, topic:122884”]lol? i know why you a super junior member im junior but i know so much about coding servers…

to edit shops is very fucking simple go to npc hander then search for what npc id the shop owner is (hold ctrl + f) then find all the item ids it has , then add what ever you want :0
if u still dont know hwo to edit fucking shops your fucking dum![/quote]

Im not dumb if i dont code for moparscape sources you faggot , and quit insulting me , i know python and everything there is to know about c++ , so stfu , and get off my thread if your going to insult me
